column2: 1. A person's family is the most important thing in life.
column3: 2. Even if something bad is about to happen to me, I rarely experience fear or nervousness.
column4: 3. I go out of my way to get things I want.
column5: 4. When something good I am expecting doesn’t happen, I feel less enthusiastic about life for a while.
column6: 5. When I'm doing well at something I love to keep at it.
column7: 6. I'm always willing to try something new if I think it will be fun.
column8: 7. How I dress is important to me.
column9: 8. When I get something I want, I feel excited and energized.
column10: 9. Criticism or scolding hurts me quite a bit.
column11: 10. When I want something I usually go all-out to get it.
column12: 11. I will often do things for no other reason than that they might be fun.
column13: 12. When I don’t get what I want, I lose interest in my day-to-day tasks.
column14: 13. It's hard for me to find the time to do things such as get a haircut.
column15: 14. If I see a chance to get something I want I move on it right away.
column16: 15. I feel pretty worried or upset when I think or know somebody is angry at me.
column17: 16. When I see an opportunity for something I like I get excited right away.
column18: 17. If I have been working hard at something I lose motivation if I don’t get the reward I deserve.
column19: 18. I often act on the spur of the moment.
column20: 19. If I think something unpleasant is going to happen I usually get pretty "worked up."
column21: 20. I often wonder why people act the way they do.
column22: 21. When good things happen to me, it affects me strongly.
column23: 22. I feel worried when I think I have done poorly at something important.
column24: 23. When an event I am looking forward to is cancelled, I lose the energy to arrange an alternative.
column25: 24. I crave excitement and new sensations.
column26: 25. When I go after something I use a "no holds barred" approach.
column27: 26. I have very few fears compared to my friends.
column28: 27. It would excite me to win a contest.
column29: 28. When circumstances prevent me from achieving an important goal, I find it hard to keep trying.
